name: PROJECT CYRCULUX
description:
PROJECT CYRCULUX is currently in the version Base 1.3.

Its a simplistic 2D shooter where you play a circle with some weapons and you have to fight against other geometric objects like triangles or crosses.

But you only have limited energy and shooting or getting hit consumes energy. You can gather energy by collecting energy balls that appear whenever you destroy an enemy.

So try to stay alive for as long as you can =)
